issue.title: Improve performance of row proxy object
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4521](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4521). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As noted in https://github.com/vega/vega-loader-arrow/commit/19c88e130aaeeae9d0166360db467121e5724352#r32253784, there may be some inefficiencies with the row proxy that could be mitigated by defining properties on a prototype object.
